title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Mystery

title: Asesinato en el Expreso de Oriente
description: When a murder occurs on the train he's travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

title: Wind River
description: A veteran tracker with the Fish and Wildlife Service helps to investigate the murder of a young Native American woman, and uses the case as a means of seeking redemption for an earlier act of irresponsibility which ended in tragedy.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Atómica
description: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

title: All the Money in the World
description: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

title: ¡Huye!
description: It's time for a young African American to meet with his white girlfriend's parents for a weekend in their secluded estate in the woods, but before long, the friendly and polite ambience will give way to a nightmare.

title: Hangman
description: A homicide detective teams up with a criminal profiler to catch a serial killer whose crimes are inspired by the children's game Hangman.

title: Jigsaw: El juego continúa
description: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for ten years.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
description: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

title: Suburbicon: Bienvenidos al paraíso
description: A home invasion rattles a quiet family town.

title: The Foreigner
description: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers' identities.

title: Feliz día de tu muerte
description: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

title: Mother!
description: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

title: Crooked House
description: In Agatha Christie's most twisted tale, a spy-turned-private-detective is lured by his former lover to catch her grandfather's murderer before Scotland Yard exposes dark family secrets.

title: Muerte en el Expreso de Oriente
description: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

title: Dark River
description: Following the death of her father, Alice (Ruth Wilson) returns to her home village for the first time in 15 years, to claim the tenancy to the family farm she believes is rightfully hers.

title: Los 8 más Odiados
description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

title: Seven Sisters
description: In a world where families are limited to one child due to overpopulation, a set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep by the government and dangerous infighting while investigating the disappearance of one of their own.
genre: Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller

title: La llegada
description: When twelve mysterious spacecrafts appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

title: El regreso del demonio
description: Sheriff Dan Tashtego and a team of creeper hunters enlist the help of officer Davis Tubbs to help stop the monster's eating spree.

title: El Hombre de Nieve
description: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose pink scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to participate.

title: Kiss and Kill
description: A woman named Katy is blackmailed with photos of sexual nature into giving in to any of her blackmailer's whims. Seeing no other way out, she opts for deadly revenge.
